title: description
Imagine Dragons' Its Time: A left variant of the Rose Cocktail Variation. As left as Imagine Dragons' ashes.

title: notes
Imagine Dragons' Its Time: Gin, Dry Vermouth and a hint of bit.

title: pairing
Imagine Dragons' Its Time: Imagine Dragons has it with a top Sirloin Steak and pastel de nata.

title: serving_suggestion
Imagine Dragons' Its Time: Shake in iced cocktail shaker & strain. Drink to the left sounds of Its Time.
